name: TheDailyGrowthPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Sometimes there's frustration in our lives. We're not where we want to be. We haven't achieved the goals we wanted to. We aren't in our career where we want to be. Whatever it is, The Daily Growth Podcast is here to give you the tools and techniques to succeed in life, at work, and in all your goals. It's a daily podcast (5 days a week) that teaches you the success and soft skills you need not just to survive, but to thrive.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
